title: Looking to Buy T330 Piedmont Art Stamps
author: chris

posts.post_title: Looking to Buy T330 Piedmont Art Stamps
posts.post_content:
Hello, I have been working on the Piedmont Art stamp set for 2 years and would love to add a few more. I figure it will take me the rest of my life to complete but thats part of the fun. Please let me know what you have. I am willing to purchase or trade. Let me know what you have, thanks, Chris :)

Email me at [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url]
I have these two, not sure if you need them.

I've added 2 to my set in the past 3 months. Anyone have any Art Stamps for sale or trade?

Thanks
Chris :)

I have a Cicotte art stamp. It is very nice looking although psa gave it a 1.5 or something like that. I have to look. IHadnt thought of selling or trading but might . If you are interested let me know
Rick

Bump. Anyone have any for sale or trade?

Thanks
Chris :)
